name: Armaan Malik
description: '''Armaan Malik''' (born 22 July, 1995) is an Indian [[playback singer]], [[song writer]], [[voice-over artist]], and [[actor]]. Malik made his debut in 2007 as a child singer in [[Bollywood]] with the song ''"Bum Bum Bole"''  featured in the movie ''[[Taare Zameen Par]]''. His first on-screen appearance was in the film ''[[Kaccha Limboo]]'' in 2011.  Previously represented by [[Universal Music India]] and [[T-Series (company)|T-Series]], he is now managed by [[Arista Records]].
